item.sql: select u.id,u.FJ, u.uname as bt,u2.uname deptname from g_users u inner join g_dept d on u.id=d.user_id inner join g_dept d2 on d.fid=d2.id inner join g_users u2 on u2.id=d2.user_id and u2.status>-1 where u.utype in (0,2,9) and u.status>-1 and u2.uname !='中国浦东干部学院'

button.success: if(ids==''){alert('请选择需要重置班级密码的人员')}else{if (confirm('是否确定要重置班级密码？')) {$.ajax({ type: 'post', url: 'backHtmlHelp.ashx', data: { ids: ids, func: 'updateBJMM' },success: function (data) { if (data ==1) { alert('重置班级密码成功！'); window.location.reload();}else(alert('重置班级密码失败！'))}});}}
